/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, acting as the main artery of the image, is flanked by trees on both sides, their green foliage contrasting with the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The sun casts its warm glow on the scene, illuminating the buildings and creating a play of light and shadow that adds depth to the image.
